page.title: 16 HOME LIFE
page.content: During our survey of the area, we found that 90% of the women were housewives and that any part-time employment involved farming activities. Hobbies included knitting,sewing, gardening,cooking,sport,dried flowers, walking,refurbishing machinery and antiques. These hobbies reflected an interest in the home and in the countryside, which would appear to be very common in this area. However, most of our interviewing was accomplished during the day when, generally, only housewives were at home. Within this area, it appears that hobbies are more important as a spare time activity than is television. We discovered that sport and news are watched during the evening with an occassional interest in soap operas.
